references.paper_title: SDXL: Improving latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to its contribution of the SDXL model, which is a crucial component of the Textoon framework for generating high-quality images of 2D cartoon characters.

references.paper_title: SAM 2: Segment anything in images and videos
references.reason: This paper is important for its contribution of the SAM2 method, which is used in Textoon to achieve pixel-level segmentation for each component of the generated character image, improving accuracy and efficiency.

references.paper_title: Make-a-character: High quality text-to-3d character generation within minutes
references.reason: This paper is directly related to Textoon's goal of generating characters from text descriptions and shares similar techniques for achieving high quality results.

references.paper_title: Exploring the limits of transfer learning with a unified text-to-text transformer
references.reason: This paper is important for providing a foundation in large language models (LLMs) which are used to parse textual descriptions and extract detailed information on the attributes and features to be included in the generation of the characters.
This paper provides foundational knowledge of LLMs and their capabilities, influencing the use of LLMs for text parsing and character attribute extraction in the Textoon framework.
